3.1 RC 2

It was a conditional breakpoint where the condition was
   address == 1235

address was an instance variable.

I have not been able to reproduce this problem. It appeas to be an evaluation 
bug (I thought it might be a problem with our interpretation of 'int' 
== 'long' or 'long' == 'int').
